thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 41 of 522
thread.title: JT

author: JT
title: JT
text: I've been wanting to try Fabletics and decided to try after I saw that becoming a VIP member included an "Intro Price" discount on your first order. This is a total lie. Everything online will be marked at 50% off the VIP discount but you will not get that price at checkout. I am annoyed, to say the least. What is the point of enrolling in the VIP club if I'm not able to get the introductory prices to try items?
